I want to…: Set the number of videos displayed on the video wall
So that: I can manage the overall effect and manage the bandwidth/processing power required for the effect

I want to…: Set either 2x2, 4x3, 6x4 (across, down) videos to be played on the video wall concurrently
So that: I can manage the overall effect and manage the bandwidth/processing power required for the effect

I want to…: Set a border colour to be displayed around the video wall
So that: There is a neutral background around the video wall

I want to…: Have a separate control screen (from the video wall screen)
So that: I can manage settings, load videos, etc. on a separate screen to the video wall (in dual screen setups)

I want to…: Set a fade in and fade out length for each video in the play queue in tenths of seconds
So that: I can control the fade per video in the play queue for the best visual effect rather hanving one global setting for all videos

I want to…: Set the start and end points for each video for each play queue in tenths of seconds
So that: I can remove artefacts from each video, like lead-in or lead-out scenes, which will ensure that the viewers can focus on the music video and skip production extras

I want to…: Default the fade-in and fade-out lengths to zero seconds
Default the start and end points to "0:00" and full video length respectively
So that: The videos will play from start to finsih unless adjusted by the operator

I want to…: Be able to set whether videos in the play queue should start automatically when at the top of the list or manually
So that: I can control videos start to play

I want to…: Be able to define the syncronous/asynchronous gap for each video in the play queue separately
So that: Each video can have a sync/async mode that creates the best visual effect for each video rather than having one global setting for all videos

I want to…: See the video wall without any windows or application controls visible
So that: I can enjoy the video experience without being distracted by unwanted features

I want to…: See a single border colour around the video wall
So that: The backround doesn't distract from the video wall effect

I want to…: Watch the videos in a synchronised way
So that: The visual effects created by concurrently running videos are most enjoyable

I want to…: The video wall in any configuration (2x2, etc.) to take up the maximum amount of space on the wall possible
So that: The visual effect takes up as much of my view of view as possible

I want to…: See the current video fade out and the new video fade in with a pre-defined fade length for each video
So that: The videos can be blended seamlessly from one to the next

I want to…: Enter a link to a video (locally stored or online) that can be queued to play
So that: I can select an appropriate video to display on the video wall

I want to…: Add an entered video link to a play queue
So that: I can create a playlist/add videos whilst an existing video is playing

I want to…: Have a play queue that can hold up to 15 video links at any one time
So that: I can create an extensive forward play list for "fire and forget" operation

I want to…: See which video is currently playing (name, file path) in the control window separatly from the play queue
So that: I can see which video is currently playing separately from the play queue

I want to…: Move videos in the play queue up and down the list
So that: I can reorder the play queue if I want to / need to

I want to…: See the name and file path for each video in the play queue in a list sorted in play order
So that: I can know what I have added to the list, understand the running order and manage the running order

I want to…: Remove the currently playing video from the play queue when it starts to play
So that: I can see clearly what is playing versus what is queued to play

I want to…: Delete videos in the play queue
So that: I can remove videos from the queue that I no longer want to play

I want to…: Play the next video in the playlist automatically after the previous one or manually
So that: I can control when the next video starts

I want to…: Pause, restart or skip forward the currently playing video
So that: I can control when the video is playing or move quickly forwards in the play list

I want to…: Play the videos synchronously on the wall, i.e. all video images are in perfect synch with 0ms delay between each one based on settings
So that: I can achieve interesting video effects from the synchronous playing

I want to…: Play each video on the wall with predefined asynchronous gaps between each successive video (gaps to be between 100ms and 500ms)  based on settings
So that: I can achieve interesting video effects from asynchronous playing

I want to…: Retain a history of queued videos between app sessions
So that: I can quickly retrive a video to re-add it to the queue when needed

I want to…: Be able to delete videos in the play history after selecting "delete" and then confirming "yes I want to delete"
So that: I can remove unwanted videos from the history

I want to…: Sort videos in the history view by title and path
So that: I can more easly locate videos to re-add to the play queue

I want to…: Search the play history for videos by name/part of name or path/part of path
So that: I can more easly locate videos to re-add to the play queue

I want to…: Search for strings that contain text just by entering that text, e.g. "EXT" will return anything that contains "EXT" in it without using wildcards
So that: I can more easly locate videos to re-add to the play queue

I want to…: Retain fade-in, fade-out, start and stop settings for each video in the play history
So that: Videos will play as expected if re-added to the queue

I want to…: The app to buffer the next video in the play queue before it is ready start playing
So that:
The app delivers the desired sync/effect cleanly, and 
Subsequent videos play instantly on completion of the previous video
